description: History is never quite as real as when it is told by those who lived it.A historical account from the diary of Ruby Thompson, who lived from 1884-1970. Relive her story as an English housewife and mother of seven sons living in Romford, London during World War II - her revelations on the war and daily life.This second edition of volume 1 has been re-edited by Vicki Washuk and Amanda Meuwissen for BigWorldNetwork.com and additional print.
author: Ruby Side Thompson
